content: 480 yards 440 m of fingering and the larger rust-colored lace weight version pictured used about 700 yards 640 m and was achieved by working 5 extra repeats of chart 2 and 2 extra row of chart 3 leaves row 15-24 it will take about 700 yards 640 m also i hope you all enjoy knitting little ashton **errata on the oct 2022 rev version only chart 2 row 7 is missing a yarn over at the last stitch of the row that has been corrected in the april 2023 version previous versions had the yarn over where it belonged ** 1 http //www ravelry com/designers/dee-okeefe 2 http //www ravelry com/projects/stevieland/ashton-shawlette-2 3 http //www ravelry com/projects/takdpm/ashton-shawlette
